Name: Apocalypse: Floodgates
About the game: Herd 'em up, Mow 'em Down! Mindless Carnage, fast-paced action. Apocalypse: Floodgates is a Third-Person Zombie Horde Shooter featuring post-apocalyptic weapons and deadly manmade traps. Play online with up to four friends or simply play alone and see how many zombie horde waves you can take down. Activate the planted traps set on each level to make it easier to shred through zombies. Plant explosives or toss a Molotov Cocktail to cause ultimate damage. How many infected zombie waves can you take down? Features Include: Non-Stop, Fast-Paced Action that will Constantly keep you Moving and Shooting. Use over 14 Different Military Style Guns to Mow Down Hordes of Zombies. Throw or Plant over 10 Types of Explosives to Blow up Groups of Zombies. Two Game Modes: Capped Wave Count or Unlimited Waves. Play as 6 Different Warriors during your Fight. Use over 6 Post-Apocalyptic Style Melee Weapons to beat down Zombies at Close Range. Use In-Game Silver Currency to Activate Planted Traps and Shred up Zombies. Features 4 Post-Apocalyptic Style Environments. Heal Yourself or Take Less Damage by Using Medicine in Battle. Shoot Down Hundreds of Different Zombies including Large Experimental Monsters. Team Up Online with up to Four Friends (LAN Available). Scoring System with Leaderboard. In-Game Chat Communication System. Partial Controller Support.
